General.Name: Wuxi Xuelang Environmental Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Wuxi Xuelang Environmental Technology Co., Ltd. researches and develops, manufactures, and sells industrial hazardous waste and sludge incineration disposal in China and internationally. It supplies flue gas purification treatment systems primarily for use in waste incineration power plants; and ash conveying processing systems to steel enterprises. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Wuxi, China.

3.Name: Mr. Chongbiao   Wang
3.Title: Deputy Gen. Mang., Sec. and Director
